Text: The MOVING reference member state of this VC (Value Chain) is SWITZERLAND 1. The reference MOVING Card ID of this VC is VC 09 CH1. farmer led initiative, trying to reach gourmet market, no labels other than 'old varieites', project is already being copied elsewhere. Overall the type of challenge faced by this VC is Current. This VC is classified as Traditional and Innovative.   The type of innovation of this VC (Value Chain) is Endogenous and Exogenous. A few farmers in Albula Vally in Grisons revive and preserve over 30 old and partly adapted potato varieties that used to be grown in similar conditions. The innovation is related to New products. The land use systems involved are Cropland. The local assets include Natural and cultural.
